# undoCount

**Instance Property**

The number of times you can invoke undo before there are no actions left to undo.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var undoCount: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

A nonzero value doesn’t imply you can safely invoke [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/UndoManager/undo()] immediately, because you may have to close open undo groups first.

## Managing undo and redo stack depth

- **levelsOfUndo**: The maximum number of top-level undo groups the undo manager holds.
- **redoCount**: The number of times you can invoke redo before there are no actions left to redo.
